title: AD-AS graph - inflationary gap - LR adjustment

content.prompt: According to the graph above, which of the following is true about the long-run equilibrium of the economy depicted?

choices.label: The aggregate demand curve will shift to the left to restore long-run equilibrium.
The long-run aggregate supply curve will shift to the right to restore long-run equilibrium.
Without a fiscal policy stimulus, the economy will remain in a recession.
As wages increase, the short-run aggregate supply curve will shift to the left to restore long-run equilibrium.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
